Package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies

Package containing classes for common formatter stragegy logic.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IFormatterStrategy
    Base interface for formatter implementations.
    IFormatterStrategyService
    Service interface for external formatter implementations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFormatterRunnable
    Abstract implementation of the formatter Runnable.
    AbstractJavaFormatterStrategy
    Abstract base implementation of AbstractFormatterRunnable for Java formatters.
    FormatterAdvice
    Pojo to keep formatter specific values together.
    FormatterStrategyDispatcher
    Delegation class for calling the activated external formatter or the internal NetBeans formatter if the external formatters are deactivated.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AbstractFormatterRunnable.BreakException
    RuntimeException which is used as a break condition inside a Iterable.forEach(java.util.function.Consumer).

Package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies Description

Package containing classes for common formatter stragegy logic.
